kernel.ui

Class ScoreGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.score.AbstractScoreFunction
      • rescuecore2.score.DelegatingScoreFunction
        • kernel.ui.ScoreGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIComponent, ScoreFunction

    public class ScoreGraph
extends DelegatingScoreFunction
implements GUIComponent
    A ScoreFunction that also provides a components for graphing the components of the score.
